posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ken W.
Trying to complete HOF collection.  Anything contemporary of the following wanted:

Billy Hamilton, Bid McPhee, Ed Delahanty, Jesse Burkett, Amos Rusie, Cap Anson

Actually prefer low-grade (or poor-conditioned raw) in order to keep costs low.  Authenticity only concern.  Thank you.

Posted By: Paul
Good luck!  There's a McPhee with clipped corners in Mastro's auction.  I wish I had waited for it, rather than shelling out a fortune on mine.
